com.ninjaguild.dragoneggdrop.dragon

Class DragonLoot

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ninjaguild.dragoneggdrop.dragon.DragonLoot

  • public class DragonLoot
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a dragon's loot information (similar to a loot table) which may randomly spawn after the dragon's death
    Author:
    Parker Hawke - 2008Choco

      • getEggSpawnChance

        public double getEggSpawnChance()
        Get the chance that an egg will spawn. If getChestSpawnChance() is greater than 0.0%, then the egg will spawn within the chest given that the egg spawn percentage has been met.
        Returns:
        the egg spawn chance
